cab.content: hi 3rty ofrnrosot.military Secret.cp, 1 291i i r, i-^---From Viceroy, Army Department/, to Secretary of Slate for India,mh May 1920.(Received Uth.)6027. Reference to your No. 1606, dated 7 th May. Chitral way ordered on 5th May to occupy Lambabat. when his preparations admitted of him being able to do so. Information dated 10th, from Political, Chitral, now reports Lambabat clear "of Afghans.
